product_overview: TaraTarot is a multilingual tarot reading platform built using Next.js 15 and Supabase. It offers users a variety of tarot reading spreads, a numerology feature, integrated payment and credit systems, and comprehensive user dashboards. Users can authenticate via email or Google OAuth, purchase credits to perform readings, and access detailed tarot card information and interpretations in Turkish, English, and Serbian.
core_goals: Provide diverse tarot reading spreads including love, career, problem-solving and more.
Enable secure user authentication and profile management with Supabase Auth supporting email/password and Google OAuth.
Implement a credit-based payment system integrated with Shopier for purchasing reading credits.
Offer detailed tarot card gallery pages with SEO optimization and multilingual support.
Ensure a seamless and responsive user experience across devices with multi-language support (Turkish, English, Serbian).
Provide admin functionalities with secure access, and analytics for managing users, readings, and orders.
key_features: Multiple tarot reading spreads such as Love Spread, Career Spread, Situation Analysis, Relationship Analysis, Problem Solving, Marriage, Money Spread, New Lover, and Single Card readings.
User authentication with email/password and Google OAuth via Supabase Auth.
User dashboard including profile management, credit packages, recent activity, and statistics views.
Payment integration using Shopier to facilitate credit purchases and webhook handling for payment confirmation.
Multi-language support using next-intl for Turkish, English, and Serbian languages, with locale-based routing.
A comprehensive tarot card gallery featuring 78 cards with detailed meanings and SEO optimized pages.
Numerology feature with user input forms and interpretation results.
Atomic credit deduction mechanism with credits required per reading type (Simple:1, Detailed:3, Written:5).
Admin panel with IP whitelist and rate limiting to manage users, readings, orders, and analytics securely.
user_flow_summary: User Registration and Authentication: Users sign up or log in via email/password or Google OAuth, verify their email, then access dashboard.

Performing Tarot Readings: Users select a tarot spread, choose reading type (Simple, Detailed, Written), pick cards with orientation, fill any required forms for detailed/written readings, complete the reading, and view/save results with credit deduction.

Credit Purchase Flow: Users select credit packages on dashboard, redirected to Shopier payment gateway, complete payment, system verifies payment via webhook, updates credit balance, and shows success page.
Dashboard Interaction: Users view profile info, credit balance, recent readings, statistics, and manage personal data or settings.
Admin Operations: Authorized admins access admin panel to manage users, reading sessions, orders, and view analytics with additional security checks.
Multi-language Navigation: Users navigate through locale prefixed routes with language selection affecting UI text and content.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration and email verification process.
Correct authentication with email/password and Google OAuth flows.
Credit deduction aligns precisely with reading type selected and user credit balance is never negative.
Payment integration works reliably with Shopier, including webhook confirmations and credit balance updates.
Tarot reading flows handle card selection, orientation, and form data correctly and save readings.
Multi-language support reflects correct content and routes for all supported languages.
Dashboard accurately displays user profile, credit balance, recent activities, and statistics.
Admin panel enforces IP whitelist, session, and role-based access control.
Responsive UI renders correctly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Test scenarios covering registration, reading types, payments, credits, dashboard, and admin functions pass consistently.
